channel.title: Comments on: What does your work environment look like?

item.title: By: Steve McDOnagh
item.dc:creator: Steve McDOnagh
item.description: <p>@3 - never fear it cannot be as bad as mine, the rest of you are far far far far to tidy to be real "creatives" <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /><br /><br />{ <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://dominoyesmaybe.blogspot.com/2008/10/my-home-office.html"" rel="nofollow ugc">http://dominoyesmaybe.blogspot.com/2008/10/my-home-office.html"</a> rel="nofollow" target ="blank">Link</a> }</p>
item.content:encoded:
@3 – never fear it cannot be as bad as mine, the rest of you are far far far far to tidy to be real “creatives” http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

{ http://dominoyesmaybe.blogspot.com/2008/10/my-home-office.html“ rel=”nofollow” target =”blank”>Link }

item.title: By: Damien
item.dc:creator: Damien
item.description: <p>Hey - nice setup. I am scaling down <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /> I am about to put my 20" cinema display up on ebay if you are interested..</p>
item.content:encoded: Hey – nice setup. I am scaling down http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ /> I am about to put my 20″ cinema display up on ebay if you are interested..

item.title: By: nullMum
item.dc:creator: nullMum
item.description: <p> <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GM7/$File/lipsrsealed.gif"</a> /> Not saying a word - my house might be very tidy but my study is not for publication!! I know where everything is and when I retire in 2010 there will be loads of room for me to use the room for other ventures!! </p>
item.content:encoded: http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GM7/$File/lipsrsealed.gif“ /> Not saying a word – my house might be very tidy but my study is not for publication!! I know where everything is and when I retire in 2010 there will be loads of room for me to use the room for other ventures!!

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Given how tidy everyone is so far, there's NO WAY I'm publishing mine <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: Given how tidy everyone is so far, there’s NO WAY I’m publishing mine http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

item.title: By: Steve Castledine
item.dc:creator: Steve Castledine
item.description: <p>I love your view Matt (no not the scaffold :) )<br/><br /><br/><br />I could not possibly publish my desk without at least an hours tidying.</p>
item.content:encoded:
I love your view Matt (no not the scaffold ðŸ™‚ )

I could not possibly publish my desk without at least an hours tidying.

item.title: By: Stuart McIntyre
item.dc:creator: Stuart McIntyre
item.description: <p>So glad not everyone is so spotlessly tidy! Though I have to say that your desk is still vastly more tidy than mine...<br /><br />Like the 2 x laptops solution too.</p>
item.content:encoded:
So glad not everyone is so spotlessly tidy! Though I have to say that your desk is still vastly more tidy than mine…

Like the 2 x laptops solution too.
